unnormalised: Organic farming, eh? My granddad, Kishanlal ji, always said "back to basics"! Remember the Sholay days? Simpler times, simpler farming. Now everyone's talking organic. Heard even the IARI Pusa institute is pushing it. My cousin, Priya, in Kerala, swears by it for her spice farm. Seems like a good way to get good quality produce, like the tasty mangoes from Ratnagiri!
normalised: Organic farming, eh? My granddad, Kishanlal ji, always said "back to basics"! Remember the Sholay days? Simpler times, simpler farming. Now everyone's talking organic. Heard even the I A R I Pusa institute is pushing it. My cousin, Priya, in Kerala, swears by it for her spice farm. Seems like a good way to get good quality produce, like the tasty mangoes from Ratnagiri!
